item.title: Welcome
item.description:
Hello!

This is my blog.

I’m not too sure what I’m going to be using this for just yet, but the topics will likely range from writeups about programs I create to rants about what’s got me frustrated recently. Expect quite a variety!

I already have a couple of ideas for posts including sharing my experience developing Entropy and I’d love to build a habit of sharing my experiences as I create them. I think that’s a great way to really delve deep into what you’re learning.

I’m creating blog posts with Markdown so it’s really easy to show you my code inline with the posts! If you’re reading this, I should have an RSS feed up and running and it is hopefully linked at the bottom of the page. Feel free to add that to your RSS reader!
